Html:
Hi,

I downloaded vinsibal's excellent datagrid sample.  In this sample, if I scroll up and down with arrow keys in the datagridbasicsample, my CPU goes up to 60%.  This matches what I am seeing in my own usage of the datagrid that has a couple hundred rows.

I have an Intel Core 2 Duo E8500 3.16 ghz and 8 gigs of ram.

Are there any settings I can use on the grid to improve this? Or is this just the performance in V1?

Thank you,
Jon
It is really a problem, any one knows?
